name: Elegoo Centauri Carbon 2 0.4 nozzle
change_filament_gcode:
;==========换料==========
;===== date: 2025-09-06-001 =====================
;===== 01.01.09.07 =====================


SET_CONDITION J=0 A=PRINT_TOOL B=[next_extruder]

M204 S10000
;抬升Z，同时避免移动超最大范围
G1 Z{min(max_layer_z+3, printable_height+0.5)} F1200


G92 E0
G1 E-[old_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
M400

;设置风扇速度
M106 S80




{if old_filament_temp > 142 && next_extruder < 255}
M104 S[old_filament_temp]
{endif}


;切换到当前工具头
T[next_extruder]
CANVAS_SWITCH_FILAMENT T=[next_extruder]
M400
G92 E0

{if flush_length_1 > 1}
; FLUSH_START
; always use highest temperature to flush
M400
M2202 set_filament_type:UNKNOWN
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_range_high]
M106 S80
{if flush_length_1 > 23.7}
G1 E23.7 F{old_filament_e_feedrate} ; do not need pulsatile flushing for start part
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{old_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
{else}
G1 E{flush_length_1} F{old_filament_e_feedrate}
{endif}
; FLUSH_END
G1 E-[old_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
G1 E[old_retract_length_toolchange] F300
M400
M2202 set_filament_type:{filament_type[next_extruder]}
{endif}

{if flush_length_1 > 45 && flush_length_2 > 1}
; WIPE
M400
G1 X56 F10000
M106 S200
G4 P3000
M204 S18999
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
M400
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
M400
G1 X64 F8000
G1 X80 E-0.1
G1 X64
G1 X80 E-0.1
;G1 X64
;G1 X80 E-0.1
G1 X52 Y245 F10000
G1 Y264 F3000
M400
M106 S80

{endif}

{if flush_length_2 > 1}
M106 S80
; FLUSH_START
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
G1 E-[new_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
G1 E[new_retract_length_toolchange] F300
{endif}

{if flush_length_2 > 45 && flush_length_3 > 1}
; WIPE
M400
G1 X56 F10000
M106 S200
G4 P3000
M204 S18999
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
M400
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
M400
G1 X64 F8000
G1 X80 E-0.1
G1 X64
G1 X80 E-0.1
;G1 X64
;G1 X80 E-0.1
G1 X52 Y245 F10000
G1 Y264 F3000
M400
M106 S80

{endif}

{if flush_length_3 > 1}
M106 S80
; FLUSH_START
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
G1 E-[new_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
G1 E[new_retract_length_toolchange] F300
{endif}

{if flush_length_3 > 45 && flush_length_4 > 1}
; WIPE
M400
G1 X56 F10000
M106 S200
G4 P3000
M204 S18999
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
M400
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1
M400
G1 X64 F8000
G1 X80 E-0.1
G1 X64
G1 X80 E-0.1
;G1 X64
;G1 X80 E-0.1
G1 X52 Y245 F10000
G1 Y264 F3000
M400
M106 S80

{endif}

{if flush_length_4 > 1}
M106 S80
; FLUSH_START
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
{endif}

M400
M106 S200
G1 X54 F10000
M109 S[new_filament_temp]
G1 E6 F{new_filament_e_feedrate} ;Compensate for filament spillage during waiting temperature
M400
G92 E0
; WIPE
M400
G1 X56 F10000
M106 S200
G4 P3000
M204 S18999
G1 Y261.1 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7} F10000
G1 Y264.1 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7} F10000
M400
G1 Y261.1 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7} F10000
G1 Y264.1 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7} F10000
M400
G1 X64 F8000
G1 X80 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7}
G1 X64
G1 X80 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7}
G1 X64
G1 X80 E-{new_retract_length_toolchange/7}
G1 X52 Y245 F10000
G1 Y264 F3000
M400
M106 S80

{if layer_z <= (initial_layer_print_height + 0.001)}
M204 S[initial_layer_acceleration]
{else}
M204 S[default_acceleration]
{endif}

SET_CONDITION_END B=[next_extruder]    ;打印多色切片gcode，如果希望只映射一种颜色或者没有启用CANVAS的情况下不打印擦拭塔和吐料动作，将该指令写到擦拭塔后，但是需要注意，无论启用或者不启用擦拭塔，都应该该指令
machine_end_gcode:
;===== CC Pro - END Gcode ================
;===== date: 2025-09-06-001 =====================
;===== 01.01.09.07 =====================
M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
M106 S255 ;Cooling nozzle
M83
G92 E0 ; zero the extruder
G1 E-0.8
G2 I0 J1 Z{max_layer_z+0.5} E-0.5 F3000 ; lower z a little

;关闭风扇
M106 S50
M106 P2 S0

G90
{if max_layer_z > 75}G1 Z{min(max_layer_z+5, printable_height+0.5)} F20000{else}G1 Z80 F20000 {endif}; Move print head up 

;如果存在CANVAS才需要执行以下gcode
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=ENABLE_CANVAS B=1    ;判断是否启用canvas，启用则退料
;执行退料动作
M400
CANVAS_UNLOAD_FILAMENT
M400
SET_CONDITION_END



;移动到废料桶位置
M204 S5000
M82
G1 X52 Y245 F20000
G1 Y264 F3000
G92 E0
M400
M104 S0 ;Turn-off hotend
M400
M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
M400
M106 S0 ; turn off fan
M400
M106 P2 S0
M400
M106 P3 S0
M400
M84 ;Disable all steppers
M400




;设置平台表面粗糙度
SET_GCODE_OFFSET BED_ROUGHNESS=0.0
M400

;====判断使用A面或B面，对应选择网床数据====
M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=0 ;判断启用的网床数据，0代表A面，1代表B面
BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default
SET_CONDITION_END

SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=1 ;判断启用的网床数据，0代表A面，1代表B面
BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default1
SET_CONDITION_END
M400
;====结束====
machine_start_gcode:
;===== CC2 - Start Gcode ================
;===== date: 2025-09-06-001 =====================
;===== 01.01.09.07 =====================
; slice_cfg_model: 1
; 如果存在以上标志位则不执行固件配置中的PRINT_START_GCODE，PRINT_START_GCODE主要判断当前是否勾选打印校准和判断AB面，并根据逻辑判断是否执行调平。
; 规避问题：如果用户使用其它切片配置或切片软件发起打印不会执行调平的问题

G90
M106 S0
M106 P2 S0
M106 P3 S0
M104 S200
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
G28 X Y   ;XY先归零
;新结构废料桶位置
G1 X52 Y245 F20000
G1 Y264 F3000

;清洁喷嘴动作-开始
;等待温度
G28 X Y TRY
M204 S10000
G1 X52 Y250 F12000
G1 Y264 F3000
M109 S200
M106 S200
M109 S180   ;喷嘴先加热180，泄压、去除应力以及减缓可能由于冷挤压产生的结构形变
M104 S140   ;立刻同步降温并擦拭喷嘴
;在硅胶擦位置擦拭喷嘴
G1 X80 F8000
G1 X64
G1 X80
G1 X64
G1 X80
G1 X64
G1 X80
M106 S100
BED_MESH_CLEAR ;清除网床数据，以便在后端归零以及研磨喷嘴
G28 Z I128 J255 K0.1 L4  ;在后中位置进行低精度归零
M106 S200  ;开启风扇，快速降温至140℃
G1 X128 Y261 Z1 F600  ;移动至研磨喷嘴位置，进行判罪研磨并等待降温
G2 Z0 I0.6 J0 F600
G2 Z-0.6 I0.6 J0 F600
G2 X130 I0.6 J0 F600
G2 X132 I0.6 J0 F600
G2 X134 I0.6 J0 F600
G1 F600
G1 X120
G1 X136
G1 X120
G1 X136
G1 X120
G3 X122 I0.6 J0 F600
G3 X124 I0.6 J0 F600
G3 X126 I0.6 J0 F600
G3 X128 I0.6 J0 F600
G3 Z0.2 I0.6 J0 F600
G1 Z10 F600
G1 X80 Y250 F12000
G1 Y264 F3000
G1 X64 F15000
G1 X80
G1 X64
G1 X80
G1 X64
G1 X80
G1 X128 Y261 F15000
G1 Z0.2 F600
G2 Z0 I0.6 J0 F600
G2 Z-0.6 I0.6 J0 F600
G2 X130 I-0.6 J0 F600
G2 X132 I-0.6 J0 F600
G2 X134 I-0.6 J0 F600
G1 F600
G1 X120
G1 X136
G1 X120
G1 X128
;等待喷嘴、床温度
M109 S140
M106 S0
M400

;清洁喷嘴动作-结束

;抖动消除热床研磨喷嘴时产生的形变
G2 Z0 I0.6 J0 F600
G2 Z0.6 I0.6 J0 F600
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
G1 Z10 F3000
G1 Z10.15 F3000
M400

;清洁喷嘴动作-结束






;打印前快速归零，包括Z轴

M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] A
M106 S0




;网床应用宏-开始

G28 X Y TRY
G1 X20 Y20 F20000
G28
M400

;====判断是否存在AB面网床数据，不存在则进行调平====
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=0 ;判断选择的平台AB面，0代表A面，1代表B面
M400
;设置平台表面粗糙度
SET_GCODE_OFFSET BED_ROUGHNESS=-0.06 MOVE=1 MOVE_SPEED=1
M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_DATEA B=0 ;判断A面网床数据是否为空，是则执行
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=default MESH_MIN=10,10 MESH_MAX=243,246 PROBE_COUNT=8,8 ALGORITHM=BICUBIC FROM_SLICER=2
M400
SAVE_CONFIG
M400
SET_CONDITION_END

SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=1 ;判断启用的网床数据，0代表A面，1代表B面
M400
;设置平台表面粗糙度
SET_GCODE_OFFSET BED_ROUGHNESS=-0.015 MOVE=1 MOVE_SPEED=1
M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_DATEB B=0 ;判断B面网床数据是否为空，是则执行
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=default1 MESH_MIN=10,10 MESH_MAX=243,246 PROBE_COUNT=8,8 ALGORITHM=BICUBIC FROM_SLICER=2
M400
SAVE_CONFIG
M400
SET_CONDITION_END
;====结束====


;====打印校准====


SET_CONDITION J=0 A=PRINT_CALIBRATE B=1 ;判断是否启用打印校准
{if (max(3,first_layer_print_size[0]/29) > 6) or (max(3,first_layer_print_size[1]/29) >= 6) }
;如果启用打印前调平，执行以下调平流程
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=A MESH_MIN={max(first_layer_print_min[0]-10,10)},{max(first_layer_print_min[1]-10,10)} MESH_MAX={min(243,first_layer_print_min[0]+first_layer_print_size[0]+10)},{min(246,first_layer_print_min[1]+first_layer_print_size[1]+10)} PROBE_COUNT={max(4,round(first_layer_print_size[0])/29)},{max(4,round(first_layer_print_size[1])/29)}  ALGORITHM=BICUBIC FROM_SLICER=1

{else}
 
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE PROFILE=A MESH_MIN={max(first_layer_print_min[0]-10,10)},{max(first_layer_print_min[1]-10,10)} MESH_MAX={min(243,first_layer_print_min[0]+first_layer_print_size[0]+10)},{min(246,first_layer_print_min[1]+first_layer_print_size[1]+10)} PROBE_COUNT={max(3,round(first_layer_print_size[0])/29)},{max(3,round(first_layer_print_size[1])/29)}  ALGORITHM=LAGRANGE FROM_SLICER=1

{endif}
M400
SAVE_CONFIG
M400
G28 Z
SET_CONDITION_END


;====判断使用A面或B面，对应选择网床数据====
M400
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=0 ;判断启用的网床数据，0代表A面，1代表B面

BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default
SET_CONDITION_END

SET_CONDITION J=0 A=BED_MESH_PROFILE B=1 ;判断启用的网床数据，0代表A面，1代表B面

BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default1
SET_CONDITION_END
M400

;====结束====

;网床应用宏-结束








;预设加速度，划线准备打印
M204 S{min(20000,max(1000,outer_wall_acceleration))} ;Call exterior wall print acceleration

;移动到废料桶位置
G1 X52 Y245 F20000
G1 Y264 F3000

 ;当前工具头耗材的最高打印温度
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]

;设置风扇
M106 S50






;换料宏-开始

;如果存在CANVAS才需要执行以下gcode
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=PRINT_TOOL B=[initial_no_support_extruder]

M400

;切换到当前工具头
T[initial_no_support_extruder] 
CANVAS_SWITCH_FILAMENT T=[initial_no_support_extruder]
M400



;临时增加测试-开始
G1 X52 Y245 F10000
G1 Y264 F1000
;临时增加测试-结束


;清空喷嘴残留耗材
; FLUSH_START
G1 E7.70804 F523
G1 E0.856449 F50
G1 E7.70804 F523
G1 E0.856449 F50
G1 E7.70804 F523
G1 E0.856449 F50
M73 P52 R15
G1 E7.70804 F523
G1 E0.856449 F50
G1 E7.70804 F523
G1 E0.856449 F50
; FLUSH_END
G1 E-2 F1800
M106 S200
G4 P5000




;晃掉废料，同时适当回抽
M204 S18000
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1 F10000
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1 F10000
M400
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1 F10000
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1 F10000
M400
G1 Y261.1 E-0.1 F10000
G1 Y264.1 E-0.1 F10000
M400

G1 X64 F8000
G1 X80 E-0.1
G1 X64
G1 X80 E-0.1
G1 X64
G1 X80 E-0.1
M106 S0

SET_CONDITION_END B=[initial_no_support_extruder]

;换料宏-结束







;移动至画线起始位置
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-1} Y-1.2 F20000
G1 Z0.5 F900
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]
M83
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder


;--------------擦拭线开始-----------------

G1 E6 F{min(1200, max(120, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]*60/2/2.5043))} 
M106 S200
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-41} E20 F{min(12000, max(1200, filament_max_volumetric_speed[initial_no_support_extruder]*60/2/2.5043))} 
G1 F6000
G1 X{print_bed_max[0]*0.5-46} E0.8
M106 S0

;--------------擦拭线结束-----------------


;判断是否启用打印校准，启用打印校准则应用打印校准的网床数据
SET_CONDITION J=0 A=PRINT_CALIBRATE B=1 
BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=A FROM_SLICER=1
SET_CONDITION_END

G1 F20000
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
;LAYER_COUNT:[total_layer_count]
;LAYER:0
